recommendations.content: Highly skilled QA engineer who I was honoured to work with. Highly driven and always responds positively when helping you.
recommendations.author: Matthew Smith

recommendations.content: Santosh is an excellent SDET. he has very high coding standards for frameworks he is involves in. He continues to learn and shares his knowledge with other SDETs and Developers. His knowledge of the testing domain, whats needed to be tested and testing theory is something that I've learnt from him. I can't recommend Santosh enough
recommendations.author: Matthew Killgallon
